response.overview: The largest and most anticipated dance festival in America comes to your living room via this brightly-lit, energetically-filmed presentation from spectacular Bayfront Park in Miami! Watch with 45,000 fans as the world's best dance technicians bring the thump all day and all night! Features performances by Junkie XL, Paul Oakenfold, Adam F, Tiesto, Rabbit In The Moon, Josh Wink, Paul Van Dyk, and many more!
response.title: The UMF Experience 2004
